div.p: Given a Meta-MEME hidden Markov model (HMM), mhmme randomly generates sequence from the model and prints them in Fasta format.

ul.li: <HMM file> - An HMM in Meta-MEME format must be provided. If the filename is given as '-', then 'mhmme' will attempt to read the HMM from standard input.

div.p: The program prints to standard output one or more sequences in Fasta format.

ul.li: --numseq <integer> The number of sequences to emit. Default is 1.

--occurs Rather than printing the raw sequence, print a pseudo-sequence in which non-motif regions are represented as hyphens and motifs are represented like this: *____7___*, where 7 is the motif index.
--seed <integer> Set the seed for the random number generator. By default, the seed is set from the clock.
